dcterms:description: A randomized dataset used to determine decisions regarding fleet composition and capacity under various operational scenarios for paratransit services.
dcterms:title: Randomized simulated dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Aboah
dcterms:description: Data from the National Household Travel Survey used to investigate factors influencing the use of transportation network company services.
dcterms:title: National Household Travel Survey Data

dcterms:creator: M. Dickens
J. Neff
dcterms:description: A comprehensive fact book providing statistics and information on public transportation in the United States.
dcterms:title: APTA 2011 Public Transportation Fact Book

dcterms:description: Euclidean distances calculated for vehicle routing, used in the context of optimizing travel routes for paratransit services.
dcterms:title: Euclidean distances for vehicle routing

dcterms:creator: C. H. Papadimitriou
dcterms:description: DARP datasets referenced in various studies, focusing on the Dial-A-Ride Problem and its computational challenges.
dcterms:title: Dial-A-Ride Problem (DARP) datasets
